project_name.description: Project Name. Must be lower case without spaces.

databricks_cli_profile.description: Databricks CLI Profile Name to authenticate with Databricks Connect Remote Session

databricks_cloud_provider.description: Cloud Provider which Databricks Service is Deployed on

databricks_service_account_key_name.description: Databricks Service Account Client ID Secret Name. Can be associated with Databricks Secrets/ AWS Secrets Manager/ Azure Key Vault/ etc

databricks_service_account_key_secret.description: Databricks Service Account Client Secret Secret Name. Can be associated with Databricks Secrets/ AWS Secrets Manager/ Azure Key Vault/ etc
